title: The Asset Allocator: Mapping, Rather Than Tripping Over, Your Emotions
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Neuroeconomics explains how the brain physiologically responds to stimuli and sometimes trips us up, based on the uneasy coexistence between primitive and advanced neural systems. This podcast (5:06) suggests we employ such insights to map our emotions rather than trip over them. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
